summary: Research is a careful and creative way to learn new things and understand the world better. It involves finding, organizing, and analyzing information while being careful to avoid mistakes and biases. Researchers do this to discover new knowledge, test ideas, and develop new methods. There are many types of research, like science, humanities, and social science research, each with its own methods. People who do research are called researchers, and they often have special training and knowledge in their field.
title: Research
